basic_information.scholarship_name: Douglas R. Getzoff Endowed Theatre Design Scholarship

description: This scholarship was established in 2006 after the passing of theatre professor Douglas R. Getzoff, who taught set and technical design at UCO for 14 years. Eligibility Theatre design major Junior or senior Enrolled full time (12+ credit hours) Completed 12+ hours at UCO Requirements 500-1000 word essay stating your short-term goals (those while studying at UCO) and long-term goals (those to be achieved upon graduation from UCO) Personal artist statement (250 words) Official transcript

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_College is Fine Arts and Design
criteria.raw_text: SIS_College is Fine Arts and Design

criteria.description: SIS_Major is Theatre Arts-Design & Tech   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Theatre Arts-Design & Tech   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Theatre Arts-Design & Tech
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major is Theatre Arts-Design & Tech   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Theatre Arts-Design & Tech   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Theatre Arts-Design & Tech

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
